entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text:
@realDonaldTrump My friend, Joe & his son Thomas are true heroes. Thomas just lost his grandfather (Joe’s father-in-law) to #Coronavirus not long ago.
Now they both are working the overnight 11am - 5 am doing calls for the Fire Department That’s the NY spirit. #COVID19Pandemic #COVID @NYGovCuomo
